scripts.clear: pnpm run clear:dist && pnpm run clear:cache
scripts.build: parcel build src/index.html --no-optimize --public-url ./ && git add . && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push -f
scripts.rel:major: pnpm run build && pnpm version --major && pnpm run rel:push
scripts.rel:minor: pnpm run build && pnpm version --minor && pnpm run rel:push
scripts.rel:patch: pnpm run build && pnpm version --patch && pnpm run rel:push
scripts.format: pnpm run format:prettier && pnpm run format:biome
